item.description:
Healing Past Relationships - Past and Present

Heal remaining pain you have had or have in former and current relationships. Learn about the expectations, beliefs and behaviors that hinder you and change them into what will support you in relationship. We will do some active work on helping resolve past relationships and current ones too!

Workshop 8-10pm, $30, sliding scale to $15 workshop
99 Crescent St., Newton, email msarndt@verizon.net to register for 7-8pm fabulous macrobiotic dinner with dessert
which is an additional $20-35 sliding scale or $5 for just for separate dessert.

Herb Pearce is a relationship coach, couples therapist and Enneagram workshop leader. He teaches workshops on personality types, communication skills, personal growth and spiritual development.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
for his schedule of events
item.name: Healing Relationship Pain - Past and Present
